Detailed Description

template<typename TYPE>
class Omiscid::SimpleRecycleList< TYPE >

Template class to manage list object.

The cells used to build the list are not created and deleted, but stored in a static object. They reused when needed, it avoids repeated allocation.

The kept cells can bee deleted by calling the static methods DeleteTheAvailableCells

Author:
Sebastien Pesnel
